siteMetadata.about:
Driven full-stack developer with 6 years of experience creating and maintaining applications across a wide variety of projects and product spaces.

Proficient in React.js, React Native, Node.js, and Express.

He has extensive start-up experience, working mostly in a remote environment for small and big projects, being qualified in all facets of development and technical leadership.

Srdjan strives to create success through user satisfaction and technology solutions that increase productivity, marketability, and overall business value.

✅ Working fully remotely since 2016.
✅ Excellent knowledge of JavaScript / ES8
✅ More than 6 years in web / mobile development
✅ AWS Certified Developer – Associate
✅ High-quality code with good documentation
